TextBody:
HI Karan,

If I understand this right, the behavior was not the same until now?

Can you please let us know what is the current version of Easy Lock that you are using and if you upgraded the EPP agents recently?

Thank you and best regards,

__________________
Cristian Tornea
Senior Technical Support Engineer & Shift Lead  (US/Canada/LATAM)
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
 

DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | Enforced Encryption | eDiscovery

Regards,
Karan

We have tested this use case internally and it seems to work as expected with the latest Easylock and EPP client version.

Please let me know if you have availability for a remote session next week and we will take a look together.

We would need access to the computer of an affected end user.

Best Regards,
